Reviews.Content: overall hotel nice location close downtown convention center restaurants real close breakfast ok institutional flavor variety leave check lock cable suit im forgot called day told found assured manager honest staff mistaken

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, completely comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: trawhysee
Reviews.Content: experience location checkin quick easy issue priority club account totally fault theirs employee fixed comfortable temperature arrived looked clean nice spacious 2 queens forgot toothpaste able free travel size front desk thankful nights sleep ive time im time mom noise disturbances guests late coming breakfast items left able eat little headed home surprised hotels normally checkout breeze complaint coffee pot wasnt luckily coffee lobby

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - not so good location”
Reviews.Author: ron3573
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel reserved family reunion mentioned reviews hotel easily 4 star location location biggest con hotel somewhat isolated service road hotel nice fairly features hotel door bells climate control automated privacy signals granite 32 lcd tv sound bathroom tv name suite provides little sofa bed night night bunch adults party night security recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Could be a four star hotel...”
Reviews.Author: JediHawk
Reviews.Content: hotel clean amenities flatscreen tvs hot breakfast major issue stops hotel topflight thats security 5 6 vehicles including mine broken sense hotel lit parking lot excuse aside hotel actually beat downtown hotels including sheraton marriot insofar concerned

Reviews.Title: “Room was small for a suite”
Reviews.Author: MRTNs
Reviews.Content: trouble finding hotel entering address blackberry forgot add east 30 miles late evening hotel hoping hotel suite little larger sofa bed twin sized uncomfortable twin mattress floor beds suite 2 beds expecting queens hotel clean hotel pool service overall nice hotel suite expectation
